quotes.message: Ignorance more frequently begets confidence than does knowledge: it is those who know little, not those who know much, who so positively assert that this or that problem will never be solved by science.
quotes.name: Charles Darwin

quotes.message: Ignorance deprives people of freedom because they do not know what alternatives there are. It is impossible to choose to do what one has never heard of.
quotes.name: Ralph B. Perry

quotes.message: Beware of false knowledge; it is more dangerous than ignorance.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Ignorance is always afraid of change.
quotes.name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.message: To remove ignorance is an important branch of benevolence.
quotes.name: Ann Plato

quotes.message: Ignorance, the root and stem of all evil.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: If ignorance is bliss, there should be more happy people.
quotes.name: Victor Cousin

quotes.message: The only victories which leave no regret are those which are gained over ignorance.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Better be ignorant of a matter than half know it.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: I am not ashamed to confess I am ignorant of what I do not know.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: Where ignorance is our master, there is no possibility of real peace.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The highest form of ignorance is when you reject something you don't know anything about.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Ignorance breeds monsters to fill up the vacancies of the soul that are unoccupied by the verities of knowledge.
quotes.name: Horace Mann

quotes.message: Ignorance is preferable to error; and he is less remote from the truth who believes nothing, than he who believes what is wrong.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Most ignorance is evincible ignorance. We don't know because we don't want to know.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: Ignorance is like a delicate fruit; touch it, and the bloom is gone.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Ignorance is never out of style. It was in fashion yesterday, it is the rage today and it will set the pace tomorrow.
quotes.name: Frank Dane

quotes.message: Ignorance is not innocence, but sin.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: Ignorance is the night of the mind, but a night without moon or star.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Ignorance speaks loudly, so as to be heard; but its volume proves reason to doubt every word.
quotes.name: Wes Fessler

quotes.message: The recipe for perpetual ignorance is: Be satisfied with your opinions and content with your knowledge.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Ignorance is the dominion of absurdity.
quotes.name: James Anthony Froude

quotes.message: The truest characters of ignorance Are vanity, and pride, and annoyance.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: Ignorance is never better than knowledge.
quotes.name: Enrico Fermi

quotes.message: Ignorance never settles a question.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Everybody is ignorant, only on different subjects.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: To be concious that you are ignorant of the facts is a great step toward knowledge.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: I would rather have my ignorance than another man's knowledge, because I have got so much more of it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: The little I know, I own to ignorance.
quotes.name: Sacha Guity

quotes.message: By ignorance the truth is known.
quotes.name: Heinrich Suso

quotes.message: It may be that the ignorant man, alone, has any chance to mate his life with life.
quotes.name: Wallace Stevens

quotes.message: I know nothing except the fact of my ignorance.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: The most violent element in society is ignorance.
quotes.name: Emma Goldman

quotes.message: Being ignorant is not so much a shame, as being unwilling to learn.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Ignorance is a virus. Once it starts spreading, it can only be cured by reason. For the sake of humanity, we must be that cure.
quotes.name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.message: Teach the ignorant as much as you can.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Ignorance is still better than martyrdom.
quotes.name: Ira N. Barin

quotes.message: Isn't it funny how ignorance is the source of strength of so many?
quotes.name: Lionel Suggs

quotes.message: Ignorance is an underrated virtue, my lord.
quotes.name: Andrew Levkoff

quotes.message: Ignorance may be bliss, but only if it outweighs curiosity.
quotes.name: Victoria Schwab

quotes.message: Read it wisely, Little One, for the power of ignorance is great.
quotes.name: Stephen Fry

quotes.message: Is it not ignorance that we share? A lie takes two. The truth we find alone.
quotes.name: Anthony Marais

quotes.message: Ignorance must be prosecuted when arrested. The only way for its arrest is by information and the only way for prosecution is through reading and learning of new things.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Even one voice in a wilderness of ignorance is a voice that is heard by someone.
quotes.name: Kristen Ashley

quotes.message: Thoroughly conscious ignorance is the prelude to every real advance in science.
quotes.name: James Clerk Maxwell

quotes.message: Ignorance is not a capital crime. It is a correctable condition.
quotes.name: Laura Knight-Jadczyk

quotes.message: To turn down knowledge is to resign to ignorance.
quotes.name: Kyle Schmalenberg

quotes.message: To know you are ignorant is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.name: Marion Zimmer Bradley

quotes.message: Ignorance must be a fun place to live; my parents seem to vacation there year-round.
quotes.name: Nenia Campbell

quotes.message: The ignorance weâ€™re ignorant of is the ignorance most difficult to remedy.
quotes.name: Leah Hager Cohen

quotes.message: A great deal of intelligence can be invested in ignorance.
quotes.name: Saul Bellow

quotes.message: The pleasures of ignorance are as great, in their way, as the pleasures of knowledge.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: Not ignorance, but ignorance of ignorance, is the death of knowledge.
quotes.name: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.message: To be ignorant of one's ignorance is the malady of ignorance.
quotes.name: A. Bronson Alcott

quotes.message: It's innocence when it charms us, ignorance when it doesn't.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: Ignorance is right!
quotes.name: Christopher Andrea

quotes.message: You can still be sincere and still be stupid.
quotes.name: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.message: The mist of ignorance, esteems untrue. Rejecting whatsoever is a wonder.
quotes.name: Ludovico Ariosto

quotes.message: It is when within the darkness of ignorance when you shout do you shine.
quotes.name: William Andrews

quotes.message: In guiltless ignorance, in ignorant guilt.
quotes.name: Stephen Crane

quotes.message: For ignorance, its growth and its protection.
quotes.name: Ezra Pound

quotes.message: Through ignorance, all troubles did surmount.
quotes.name: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.message: Pain and ignorance lead to great joy and knowledge because the Supreme Being has created nothing vain under the sun.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: All ignorance toboggans into know and trudges up to ignorance again.
quotes.name: Edward Estlin Cummings

quotes.message: Ignorance is bliss.
quotes.name: Robert William Service
